algorithm_technique: Breadth-First Search (BFS) or Depth-First Search (DFS) traversal
set for visited URLs to prevent cycles and redundant work
problem_summary_simple: Crawl web pages starting from a URL, collecting links from the same hostname.
problem_summary_technical: Performs a graph traversal (BFS/DFS) on URLs, filtering by hostname and using a set for visited nodes.
key_insights: The problem is a graph traversal where URLs are nodes and links are edges.
Hostname extraction is a key preprocessing step for filtering.
Using a set to track visited URLs is essential for efficiency and correctness.
